name: TETRISLAND
description:
In Tetrisland you have to place as many buildings on a bunch of islands as you can.

The islands are randomly generated and become more jagged as you go on. Your selection of buildings is also random but if you have the funds to do so, you can generate a new selection.

This game was made for the Quarantine Game Jam in one weekend. The theme of the jam was "Pack".

How to play:

  • Left Mouse Button to select and place buildings
  • Right Mouse Button to put a building back in the stack
